HomeTextP: Enjoy creating websites and applications. I love learning new technologies, constantly improving my skills, and exploring innovative solutions.
AboutMeP: I am a software engineer graduated from CENFOTEC, passionate about developing and implementing innovative technological solutions. During my academic training, I acquired solid knowledge in various languages and technologies such as JavaScript, Java, C#, Python, CSS, HTML, SQL, and NoSQL. Although I have no professional work experience yet, I have worked on several academic and personal projects that have allowed me to develop practical skills and an analytical approach to solving complex problems.
VeterinaryP: A program designed in Java for the management of a veterinary clinic. This system allows managing appointments, registering animal and owner data, as well as scheduling reservations at pet hotels.
PCStoreP: A program designed in Java for school management. This system implemented in Java Swing allows the management of students, teachers, courses, and groups.
SchoolP: A program designed in Java for managing a school. This system implemented in Java Swing allows for the management of students, teachers, courses, and groups.
